item.title: Pushing ISLE to Staging
item.description: This post chronicles the steps I took to push my local dg.localdomain project, an ISLE v1.3.0 build, to staging on node DGDockerX as https://isle-stage.grinnell.edu using my dg-isle and dg-islandora repositories. Directories I’ll begin by opening a terminal on the staging host, DGDockerX as user islandora. Then I very carefully (note the use of the --recursive flags!) clone the aforementioned projects to DGDockerX like so: Host / DGDockerX Commands cd /opt git clone –recursive https://github.
